posts.content:
Can some one help me please.

Recently I have started to notice a picture of a van for sale ( red and black )

At 1st i thought it was someone who was selling their van had found a way to put this pic under their posts , like a signiture. But then I noticed it's under every single post from eveyone.

I think I might have subscribed to this guys thread but after checking my profile it says I'm not subscribed to any thread.



How do I get ride of it - ITS EVERYWHERE !

Jason
